name: Disjoint (itch)
description:
In Disjoint you and another player take control of one half of a skeleton that got separated by the local graveyard hound. To reunite your two halves you need to explore the graveyard, communicate and find each other. Since you are playing as a skeleton your eyesight has degraded a bit, so you won't see your other half unless you are standing very close to each other.

To start a new game come up with a room name, then you and another player can join the room of that name and play together. 

Disclaimer: Unfortunately, we are limited to ten lobbies of two players each. If you experience any connection issues, you might have to try again later.

Controls

WASD - Movement 
E- Interact
Enter - Chat

This is an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
